Verses: 1 sidhekkiyaa Raajaa Malkiyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Paskooraiyum Aasaariyanaana Maaseyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Seppaniyaavaiyum Eremiyaavinidaththil Anuppi:

2 neer Engalukkaagak Karththaridaththil Visaariyum; Baabilon Raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaar Engalukku Virodhamaai Yuththancheygiraan; Oruvelai Karththar Thammudaiya Ellaa Arpudha Seyalinpadiyeyum Engalukku Anukkiragancheydhu, Avanai Engalaivittup Pogappannuvaar Endru Solliyanuppinapodhu,

4 isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththar Uraikkiradhu Ennavendraal, Idho, Ungalai Alangaththukku Veliye Mutrikkaipotta Baabilon Raajaavodum Kaldheyarodum, Neengal Yuththampannumpadi Ungal Kaigalil Pidiththirukkira Yuththa Aayudhangalai Naan Thiruppivittu, Avargalai Indha Nagaraththin Naduvile Serththu,
5 naan Neettina Kaiyinaalum Balaththa Buyaththinaalum Kobamum Ukkiramum Magaa Kadumaiyumaaga Ungalode Yuththampanni,
6 indha Nagaraththin Kudigalaiyum, Manusharaiyum, Mirugangalaiyum Sangarippen; Magaa Kollainoyaal Saavaargal.

7 adharkuppinbu Naan Yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Sidhekkiyaavaiyum, Avan Oozhiyakkaararaiyum, Janaththaiyum, Indha Nagaraththile Kollainoikkum Pattayaththukkum Panjaththukkum Thappi Meedhiyaanavargalaiyum Baabilon Raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaarudaiya Kaiyilum, Avargal Saththurukkalin Kaiyilum, Avargal Praananai Vaangath Thedugiravargalin Kaiyilum Oppukkoduppen; Avan Avargalaip Pattayak Karukkinaal Vettuvaan; Avan Avargalaith Thappaviduvadhumillai, Avan Mannippadhumillai, Iranguvadhumillaiyendru Karththar Uraikkiraar Endraan.
8 pinnaiyum Avar, Indha Janangalai Nokki: Idho, Naan Ungal Munne Jeevavazhiyaiyum Maranavazhiyaiyum Vaikkiren Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

9 indha Nagaraththile Tharikkiravan Pattayaththaalum, Panjaththaalum, Kollainoyaalum Saavaan; Ungalai Mutrikkaipodum Kaldheyar Vasamaaip Purappattuppoividugiravano Pizhaippaan; Avan Praanan Avanukkuk Kidaiththa Kollaipporulaippol Irukkum.

10 en Mugaththai Indha Nagaraththukku Virodhamaai Nanmaikku Alla, Theemaikke Vaiththen Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; Adhu Baabilon Raajaavin Kaiyil Oppukkodukkappadum; Avan Akkiniyaal Adhai Sutterippaan Endru Sol Endraar.
11 yoodhaa Raajaavin Kudumbaththaaraiyum Nokki: Karththarudaiya Vaarththaiyaik Kelungal.

12 dhaaveedhin Kudumbaththaare, Ungal Seygaigaludaiya Pollaappinimiththam En Ukkiram Akkiniyaippol Purappattu, Avikkiravan Illaamal Eriyaadhapadikku, Neengal Erkanave Nyaayangettu, Parikoduththavanai Odukkugiravanudaiya Kaikkuth Thappuviyungal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

13 idho Pallaththaakkil Vaasampannugiravale, Samanaana Idaththil Kanmalaiyaai Irukkiravale, Engalukku Virodhamaai Varugiravan Yaarendrum, Engal Vaasasthalangalukkul Varugiravan Yaar Endrum Sollugira Unakku Naan Edhiraaliyaayirukkiren Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

14 naan Ungal Kiriyaigalin Palanukkuththakkadhaai Ungalai Visaarippen; Naan Adhin Kaattile Theekkoluththuven; Adhu Adhai Sutrilumulla Yaavaiyum Patchikkum Endru Karththar Uraikkiraar Endru Sol Endraar.
